alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 15 at 7:30PM PDT until August 19 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 11 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Afternoon temperatures in the mid 90s to around 102, with overnight lows in the 60s, in the lower elevations. * WHERE...Holden Village, Lucerne, and Stehekin. * WHEN...From Noon Wednesday to 11 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those sensitive to heat. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heat may continue into the weekend. There is a chance the advisory may later need to be extended through Sunday.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
